Text: FW THE GARTMAN LETTER TUESDAY FEBRUARY PST Original Message From Dennis Gartman mailtoENRON Sent Tuesday February AM To Margaret Gartman Subject THE GARTMAN LETTER TUESDAY FEBRUARY Dennis Gartman EditorPublisher The Gartman Letter LC The information contained in this electronic message is privileged confidential protected from disclosure and is intended only for use by the recipient named above Any further disclosure or use distribution dissemination or copying of this message or any attachment is strictly prohibited such information is not warranted in any manner whatsoever It is not necessarily complete and its accuracy is not guaranteed by The Gartman Letter LC its operating entity or the principals therein If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by electronic mail or telephone Thank you PDF

FW NGXEnron Report requirementJon What would you like me to do about this Thanks Ian Original Message From Tweet Shyla CA Calgary mailtoENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESTweetCShylaCACalgaryCstweetdeloitteEcaE NRONcom Sent Tuesday July PM To Cooke Ian Subject NGXEnron Report requirement Ian I have not been able to get ahold of Jon McKay and have heard through the grapevine that he has gone to Houston with Enron Therefore I am contacting you to try to get some information necessary for the assembly of the month end pie chart I am wondering if Jonathan has designated responsibility for getting the information to us on the last business day of every month Also I would like to get the July near month information to do a test run If possible please forward me this information or let me know who to contact to get the necessary information Thanks Shyla M Tweet B Comm Staff Accountant II Deloitte Touche LLP Calgary AB Phone Fax Email mailto

FWOriginal Message From Ortiz Lucy Sent Friday August AM To Cooke Ian Subject RE Thanks This is perfect If you ever need anything from down here give me a ring L Original Message From Cooke Ian Sent Friday August AM To Ortiz Lucy Subject Hi Lucy File LO Requirementsxls Jon Mckay asked me to send you the attached data I have included Data going back until November of in case you wanted to go back past five years The attachment includes AECO CAD historicals AECO US historicalssimply using the foreign exchange rate conversion the corresponding foreign exchange rates the Henry Hub USD the basis Hope this helps please let me know if you have any further questions Regards Ian Cooke

RE Market Fundamentals VolumesHi Jon Enron currently markets about bcf of NIT per day but there is no real way of measuring total NITs taking place in the market place each day I have been told that although the total gas produced in Alberta is over bcf a day that the NIT number can easily be double this It doesnt appear that Enron markets of Albertas gas each dayyet I hope this answers your question let me know if you need anything else Ian Original Message From Jonathan McKay Sent Thursday June PM To Ian Cooke Subject Market Fundamentals Volumes Start with Peggy Hedstrom and find out if this is accurate and get back to me Thanks Jon Forwarded by Jonathan McKayCALECT on AM From Kate nronXgate on AM CDT To Jonathan CT cc Subject Market Fundamentals Volumes Jon We are getting ready to do a public launch of Enron Direct When I was in Toronto Jeff Borg said that Enron Canada marketed of the gas produced in Alberta Do you have a feel for the actual of gas Can we publically make this representation Would it be possible to get a copy of the fundamentals that one of your analysts puts together for the morning meeting Many thanks Kate

NGX InformationHi Jon I spoke with Russel and this is what he said Enron Canada Corp will be posting the letter of credit the cost will be bps per amount of LC ie the cost will be associated with the particular business groupmost likely Enron Canada NGX will provide updates and so will Russel regarding the MM credit We will have to be actively requesting our position Russel said he will be able to run real time data in a crunch situation but typically we can expect a one day lag Russel also mentioned that he is going to contact NGXs credit group so they can attempt tp mimic NGXs format the best that they can Let me know if you need anything else Ian
Deloitte Touche FileJon Here is a prototype of the file we can send to Deloitte Touche on a monthly basis Let me know what you think Ian
AGAPST Hi Jon Hope you are doing well here is this weeks AGA Ian
